Package org.osgi.service.cm.annotations

Annotation Interface RequireConfigurationAdmin

@Documented @Retention(CLASS) @Target({TYPE,PACKAGE}) @Requirement(namespace="osgi.implementation", name="osgi.cm", version="1.6") public @interface RequireConfigurationAdmin
This annotation can be used to require the Configuration Admin implementation. It can be used directly, or as a meta-annotation.
Since:
1.6
